short_description: fastpath function to perform histogram calculation on a data set.
long_description: fastpath function to perform histogram calculation on a data set, which accepts either auto-generated bins, Equal-Width bins and Variable-Width bins, output <label ,MinValue, MaxValue, CountOfValues, bin_percent>.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: MinMax
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains bin data, needed for EQUAL-WIDTH and VARIABLE-WIDTH.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains bin data, needed for EQUAL-WIDTH and VARIABLE-WIDTH.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column for which histogram computation is to be done.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column for which histogram computation is to be done.

argument_clauses.name: MethodType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the MethodType which will be used for histogram computation. Supported MethodType are {STURGES, SCOTT, EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the MethodType which will be used for histogram computation. Supported MethodType are {STURGES, SCOTT, EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}.

argument_clauses.name: NBins
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of bins to be used during histogram computation when MethodType is either EQUAL-WIDTH or VARIABLE-WIDTH, not needed for STURGES and SCOTT
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of bins to be used during histogram computation when MethodType is either EQUAL-WIDTH or VARIABLE-WIDTH, not needed for STURGES and SCOTT

argument_clauses.name: Inclusion
argument_clauses.rDescription: Indicates whether points on bin boundaries should be included in the bin on the left or the right. The permitted values are [left, right]. The default value is left.
argument_clauses.description: Indicates whether points on bin boundaries should be included in the bin on the left or the right. The permitted values are [left, right]. The default value is left.
